helper-roles.name: helper-roles
helper-roles.desc: Change or view bot helper roles

info.name: info
info.desc: Show information about bot helper roles

add.name: add
add.desc: Add up to 5 roles to the list of bot helper roles

remove.name: remove
remove.desc: Remove a role from the list of bot helper roles

clear.name: clear
clear.desc: Clear (reset) the list of bot helper roles

helper-roles.add-result-one: {ROLE} is now a bot helper role
helper-roles.add-error: Error executing command: no new bot helper role is added
helper-roles.remove-result: {ROLE} is no longer a bot helper role
helper-roles.remove-error: Error executing command: no bot helper role is removed
helper-roles.clear-error: Error executing command: nothing to clear

<text>: Users with bot helper roles can use bot commands without any cooldown.
Users with bot helper roles can use bot commands without any cooldown.

bot-admin.helper-roles<object>.title: /bot-admin helper-roles
text<text>: To reduce unnecessary bot messages in chat channels, some bot commands have cool-down or are blocked when used outside of the bot-command channel.
Users with bot helper roles are not subject to such restrictions.
- Show information about bot helper roles.
- Add up to 5 roles to the list of bot helper roles
- Remove a role from the list of bot helper roles
- Clear (reset) the list of bot helper roles.
